lines.text: The toes you step on today may be attached to the ass you'll be kissing tomorrow.

[Chino has tossed Booker down a storm drain, & replaced the grate; Hobbs shoots Booker through the grate]
He's good. Let's go
No. I think we should say somethin'. I mean c'mon, we're all Catholic, you know

[looks down to]
Booker? Earlier, Chino tried to grab your cock; I wouldn't let 'im. Amen.
